cat.name: Whiskers
facts: Cats have retractable claws.
A group of cats is called a clowder.
Cats sleep for an average of 12-16 hours a day.

cat.name: Mittens
facts: Cats have five toes on their front paws but only four on their back paws.
Cats can make over 100 different sounds.
Mittens loves to play with yarn balls.

cat.name: Shadow
facts: Cats whiskers are roughly as wide as their body.
Cats use their whiskers to measure openings and spaces.
Shadow enjoys napping in sunbeams.

cat.name: Smokey
facts: Cats have a special reflective layer behind their retinas called the tapetum lucidum.
Smokey has a soft, fluffy gray coat.
Smokey's favorite pastime is bird watching.

cat.name: Luna
facts: Cats use their tails for balance.
Luna has striking green eyes.
Luna loves to climb and explore high places.

cat.name: Oliver
facts: Cats can rotate their ears 180 degrees.
Oliver has a playful and curious personality.
Oliver's favorite toy is a feather wand.

cat.name: Cleo
facts: Cats have a strong territorial instinct.
Cleo enjoys sunbathing by the window.
Cleo's fur has distinctive black and orange markings.

cat.name: Simba
facts: Cats have a unique grooming pattern.
Simba has a regal and majestic demeanor.
Simba loves to be pampered with chin scratches.

cat.name: Whisper
facts: Cats have an excellent sense of hearing.
Whisper is known for being quiet and reserved.
Whisper enjoys cuddling on rainy days.

cat.name: Max
facts: Cats have a third eyelid called the haw.
Max is a skilled hunter of toy mice.
Max's favorite spot is on the windowsill, watching the world outside.
